name: [Boots of Aid and Comfort](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Boots_of_Aid_and_Comfort)
effects: [The Comeback](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/The_Comeback)When the wearer heals a target, it gains an additional  3 [temporary hit points](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Temporary_Hit_Points).

name: [Boots of Stormy Clamour](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Boots_of_Stormy_Clamour)
effects: [Arcane Echomalefaction](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Arcane_Echomalefaction)When the wearer inflicts a condition upon a hostile creature, they also inflict 2 turns of  [Reverberation](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Reverberation_(Condition)).[[See: Bugs](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Arcane_Echomalefaction#Bugs)]

name: [Boots of Very Fast Blinking](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Boots_of_Very_Fast_Blinking)
effects:
[Disrobing Blinkstep](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Disrobing_Blinkstep) 
Cast as a level 2 spell ( Recharge: Per turn.)

name: [Cinder Shoes](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Cinder_Shoes)
effects: [Cinders](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Cinders)Whenever you  [Burn](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Burning_(Condition)) an enemy, you gain 2 turns of  [Heat](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Heat_(Condition)).

name: [Hoarfrost Boots](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Hoarfrost_Boots)
effects: [Hoarfrost Balance](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Hoarfrost_Balance)You cannot fall  [Prone](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Prone_(Condition)) while traversing  [Icy](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Ice_(surface)) terrain.

name: [Mystra's Grace](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Mystra%27s_Grace)
effects:
[Feather Fall](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Feather_Fall) 
Cast as a level 1 spell at will.

name: [Spiderstep Boots](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Spiderstep_Boots)
effects: [Spider Step](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Spider_Step)Immune to being  [Enwebbed](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Enwebbed_(Condition)). Your [Movement Speed](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Movement_Speed) is not affected by  [Web](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Web_(surface)) surfaces.

name: [Tyrannical Jackboots](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Tyrannical_Jackboots)
effects: [Scintillating](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Scintillating)You gain a +1 bonus to [Charisma](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Charisma)   [Ability checks](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Ability_check) and  [Saving throws](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Saving_throw).

name: [Varsh Ko'kuu's Boots](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Varsh_Ko%27kuu%27s_Boots)
effects: [Caretaker's Care](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Caretaker%27s_Care) [Acidic](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Acid_(surface)) surfaces don't affect you, and you are [Resistant](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Resistant) to [Acid](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Acid) damage.

name: [Acrobat Shoes](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Acrobat_Shoes)
effects:
[Acrobatics](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Acrobatics) +1
 [Advantage](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Advantage) on [Dexterity](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Dexterity)  [Saving throws](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Saving_throw).

name: [Boots of Apparent Death](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Boots_of_Apparent_Death)
effects:
[Feign Death](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Feign_Death) ( + )
Cast as a level 3 spell ( Recharge: [Short rest](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Short_rest).)

name: [Boots of Arcane Bolstering](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Boots_of_Arcane_Bolstering)
effects: [Rapid Caster](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Rapid_Caster)Each time they  [Dash](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Dash), the wearer gains  [Arcane Charge](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Arcane_Charge_(Condition)) for 2 turns.

name: [Boots of Brilliance](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Boots_of_Brilliance)
effects:
[Restore Bardic Inspiration](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Restore_Bardic_Inspiration) 
Play your instrument to restore one of your Bardic Inspiration slots. ( Recharge: [Long rest](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Long_rest).)

name: [Boots of Genial Striding](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Boots_of_Genial_Striding)
effects: [Genial Strider](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Genial_Strider)The wearer's [Movement Speed](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Movement_Speed) is unimpeded by  [Difficult Terrain](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Difficult_Terrain_(Condition)).

name: [Boots of Speed](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Boots_of_Speed)
effects:
[Click Heels](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Click_Heels) 
Click the heels of your boots to gain speed and freedom of movement.

name: [Boots of Uninhibited Kushigo](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Boots_of_Uninhibited_Kushigo)
effects: [Experienced And Deadly](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Experienced_And_Deadly)The wearer deals additional damage equal to their  [Wisdom](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Wisdom) Modifier with unarmed strikes.

name: [Evasive Shoes](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Evasive_Shoes)
effects:
[Acrobatics](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Acrobatics) +1
 [Armour Class](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Armour_Class) +1

name: [Linebreaker Boots](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Linebreaker_Boots)
effects: [Adrenaline Rush](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Adrenaline_Rush)When the wearer  [Dashes](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Dash) or takes a similar action during combat, they gain  [Wrath](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Wrath_(Condition)) for 3 turns.

name: [Slinging Shoes](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Slinging_Shoes)
effects:
[Dexterity](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Dexterity)  [Saving throws](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Saving_throw) +1
[Shoe Slinger](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Shoe_Slinger)Returns to its owner when thrown. On a hit deal an additional 2d4Psychic damage.

name: [Spaceshunt Boots](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Spaceshunt_Boots)
effects:
[Dimension Door](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Dimension_Door) ( + )
Cast as a level 4 spell ( Recharge: [Long rest](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Long_rest).)

name: [Springstep Boots](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Springstep_Boots)
effects: [Swift Strides](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Swift_Strides)When the wearer  [Dashes](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Dash) or takes a similar action during combat, they gain  [Momentum](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Momentum_(Condition)) for 3 turns.

name: [Swiresy Shoes](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Swiresy_Shoes)
effects:
[Acrobatics](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Acrobatics) +1
[Refined Vaulting](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Refined_Vaulting) [Jump](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Jump) distance is increased by  1.5 m / 5 ft.

name: [The Watersparkers](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/The_Watersparkers)
effects: [Electrify Water](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Electrify_Water)When the wearer stands in  [Water](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Water_(surface)) during combat, it becomes  [Electrified Water](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Electrified_Water).[Watersparks](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Watersparks)If the wearer starts their turn on an  [Electrified Water](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Electrified_Water) surface, they gain 3  [Lightning Charges](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Lightning_Charges_(Condition)).

name: [Bonespike Boots](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Bonespike_Boots)
effects:
[Brutal Leap](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Brutal_Leap) ( + )
Leap at a target and possibly knock it  [Prone](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Prone_(Condition)). ( Recharge: Per turn.)

[Evasive Instinct](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Evasive_Instinct)You have a +1 bonus to  [Armour Class](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Armour_Class) and  [Saving throws](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Saving_throw) as long as you are not wearing [armour](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Armour) or holding a [shield](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Shields).[Refined Vaulting](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Refined_Vaulting) [Jump](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Jump) distance is increased by  1.5 m / 5 ft.

name: [Helldusk Boots](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Helldusk_Boots)
effects:
[Hellcrawler](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Hellcrawler) 
Teleport to an area and deal 2d8Fire damage where you land. The impact blast spreads in a 3 m / 10 ft zone. ( Recharge: [Short rest](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Short_rest).)

[Steadfast](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Steadfast)You cannot be forcibly moved by a foe's spells or actions, and you ignore the effects of  [Difficult Terrain](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Difficult_Terrain_(Condition)).[Infernal Evasion](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Infernal_Evasion)When you fail a  [Saving throw](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Saving_throw), you may use your  [Reaction](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Actions#Reactions) to succeed instead.

name: [Disintegrating Night Walkers](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Disintegrating_Night_Walkers)
effects:
[Misty Step](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Misty_Step) 
Cast as a level 2 spell ( Recharge: [Short rest](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Short_rest).)

[Night Walker](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Night_Walker)The affected creature cannot be  [Enwebbed](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Enwebbed_(Condition)),  [Entangled](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Entangled_(Condition)), or  [Ensnared](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Ensnared_(Condition)) and cannot slip on  [Grease](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Grease_(surface)) or  [Ice](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Ice_(surface)).

name: [Boots of Elemental Momentum](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Boots_of_Elemental_Momentum)
effects:
[Athletics](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Athletics) +1
[Elemental Momentum](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Elemental_Momentum)Whenever the wearer deals [Acid](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Acid), [Cold](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Cold), [Fire](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Fire), [Lightning](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Lightning) or [Thunder](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Thunder) damage with [Spells](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Spell) or [Cantrip](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Cantrip), they gain  [Momentum](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Momentum_(Condition)) for 2 turns.

name: [Boots of Striding](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Boots_of_Striding)
effects:
[Athletics](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Athletics) +1
[Focused Stride](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Focused_Stride)When you cast a spell that requires  [Concentration](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Concentration), you gain  [Momentum](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Momentum_(Condition)) for 1 turn. While you are concentrating, you cannot be knocked  [Prone](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Prone_(Condition)) or moved against your will.

name: [Blackguard's Greaves](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Blackguard%27s_Greaves)
effects:
[Athletics](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Athletics) +1
[Strider Movement](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Strider_Movement)You gain  [Longstrider](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Longstrider_(Condition)).

name: [Dark Justiciar Boots](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Dark_Justiciar_Boots)
effects:
[Dexterity](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Dexterity)  [Saving throws](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Saving_throw) +1

 [Shadow Teleportation](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Shadow_Teleportation) 
Teleport to an unoccupied, obscured spot. ( Recharge: [Short rest](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Short_rest).)

name: [The Speedy Lightfeet](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/The_Speedy_Lightfeet)
effects:
[Athletics](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Athletics) +1
[Speedy Sparks](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Speedy_Sparks)When the wearer  [Dashes](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Dash) or takes a similar action in combat, they gain 3  [Lightning Charges](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Lightning_Charges_(Condition))

name: [Unwanted Masterwork Greaves](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Unwanted_Masterwork_Greaves)
effects: [Athletics](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Athletics) +1

name: [Vital Conduit Boots](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Vital_Conduit_Boots)
effects:
[Athletics](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Athletics) +1
[Vital Conduit](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Vital_Conduit)Grants the wearer  8 [temporary hit points](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Temporary_Hit_Points) when they cast a [Spell](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Spell) that requires  [Concentration](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Concentration).

name: [Boots of Persistence](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Boots_of_Persistence)
effects:
[Dexterity](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Dexterity)  [Saving throws](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Saving_throw) +1
[Legendary Mobility](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Legendary_Mobility)You gain  [Freedom of Movement](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Freedom_of_Movement_(Condition)) and  [Longstrider](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Longstrider_(Condition)).

name: [Boots of Psionic Movement](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Boots_of_Psionic_Movement)
effects:
[Dexterity](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Dexterity)  [Saving throws](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Saving_throw) +1
 
 [Githborn: Flying Boots](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Githborn:_Flying_Boots) 
Cast as a level 3 spell ( Recharge: [Long rest](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Long_rest).)

[Flying Strike](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Flying_Strike)When a [githyanki](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Githyanki) casts  [Fly](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Fly), their next melee weapon attack deals an additional 1d4Psychic damage.
